article.headline: SMS 68, Drake 59
article.story: SPRINGFIELD, Mo. (AP) -- Nathan Bilyeu scored 11 points to lead Southwest Missouri State to a 68-59 win over Drake Tuesday night. Southwest Missouri (16-10, 8-7 in the Missouri Valley) led 35-31 at halftime when Drake (10-13, 6-9) scored the first two baskets of the second half to tie the game at 35. Drake's full-court press forced Southwest Missouri into 13 second-half turnovers and the Bulldogs regained the lead at 37-36 on two free throws by Pete Eggers with 17:12 left. A 3-point play by Sean Tracy put Drake up 44-41 with 13:54 remaining and a 3-pointer by Marcin Konarzewski with 9:16 left pushed Drake's lead to 49-45. But Southwest Missouri scored the next 10 points to go up 55-49 with 5:32. Drake was led by Chaun Brooks with nine points.
